alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 7:21PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMERON PARISH... SOUTHERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 721 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Neches to near Port Acres to 8 miles southeast of Stowell. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Bridge City, West Orange, Sabine Pass, Port Acres, Orangefield, Pinehurst, and Sea Rim State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
